response.overview: In this dadaist satire aimed at the hypocrisy of incel culture, dysfunctional roommates Chris and Adolf have a wrench thrown in their relationship when Adolf starts bringing a girl home. Angry and sexually frustrated, Chris sees his emotions manifest as flesh and bone, a being known only as Four Cent Garbage. All of this against a backdrop of Information Age surreality, where memes and online culture represent a dreary and despondent lifestyle of contempt for the real world.
response.tagline: Boy meets girl. Internal demon kills girl. Boy moves on.
response.title: Peanut Butter & A Dead Body
